Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes I’m unsure whether GenAI is telling me the correct information. However teachers aren’t able to answer most of the questions I have towards assignments so GenAI can be helpful then.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Sometimes I’m unsure if the feedback I’m getting from AI is correct whereas I know my teacher will be giving me correct information.
